name: Gravigun Dude
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini jam 87. Theme is "Break", limitation is "The player is a pacifist"

Use your prototype gravity gun to break through the underground science facility and destroy its corrupted core. Be careful, you must avoid casualties at all costs

Features:

Gravity gun mixed together with a vacuum cleaner

Destruction, explosions, lots of it!

Has some puzzle elements

10 small levels with a powerful boss at the end

speedrun-friendly

Controls:

wasd - move,

left mouse button - attract objects

right mouse button - push objects away

e - interact

r - restart current level

h - return to main menu

Used software:

Godot Engine v3.3.2

Paint.net, sprites

Bfxr, sounds

Big thanks to Daniel Linssen for his m5x7 font
